channel.title: Daily-Drops on Paul's Particles
channel.description: Recent content in Daily-Drops on Paul's Particles

item.title: December 1, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to use linear algebra in applications of Quantum Mechanics.

Biography worthy

The time I spend slow cooking food, and how it can bring me warmth and comfort on cold and dark days such as this one.

Thought I Thought

I wonder if using the terminal to manage my tasks will work out to suit me better than the app on my phone.

Today’s Media

I watched Yu Yu Hakusho again with my brother.

item.title: November 30, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

The fundamental math needed for Quantum mechanics.

Thought I Thought

I should maybe switch up some of the prompts for the daily drop after each month… We’ll see what I decide tomorrow I guess.

Today’s Media

I watched some more Yu Yu Hakusho, currently at episode 84.

Song Of The Day

Some random Lofi music for the chill vibes.

Today’s Question

Today, I ask myself how to keep the balance of things in life. The current things I tend to focus on are creativity, study, work, household, exercise and social relationships. I hope my balance is doing well at the moment (I feel so at least), but sometimes it can feel a bit much to manage. I should start looking into making this easier for myself.

item.title: November 29, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to be more efficient at household tasks.

Thought I Thought

They should invent some term for narcissism that is a bit weaker than narcissism.

Today’s Media

I watched the JJK execution special in theatres. The recap was so ass I could die.

Song Of The Day

Hatsune Miku, Magical Cure! Love Shot! Ironically…?

Today’s Question

What else should I be doing? I feel like I am forgetting something. (It was writing this article today, I did it the day after)

item.title: November 28, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

More about how to socialise with colleagues.

Thought I Thought

How does a story become funny? Or in what context.

Today’s Media

I played Cult of the Lamb with Levi.

Song Of The Day

Sinterklaas songs, because we celebrated Sinterklaas at the company

Today’s Question

Am I driving safely enough, or are people on the road just stupid?

Note To Self

Don’t try to solve other people’s problems too much, as it may shift part of the blame on you.

item.title: November 27, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

More on concurrency, and how/why gradient descent works mathematically

Thought I Thought

How high is the highest ceiling?

Today’s Media

Watched Yu Yu Hakusho with bro

Song Of The Day

Color your night, probably gonna be my no. 1 on spotify wrapped this year again.

Today’s Question

How can I motivate myself to do more creative work?

Note To Self

Go to bed earlier!

A Fascinating World

I am really interested to write about magic that comes at some price in terms of the components used.

item.title: November 26, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to use MVar to make thread safe datastructures.

Thought I Thought

I should find a way to write these blogs on my phone as well. Should be able to figure something out, as this is just markdown…

Today’s Media

A twitter post saying the plural form of mutex is deadlock. Yeah, I felt that.

Song Of The Day

Retrogade, James Blake.

Today’s Question

What do I still need to do in the next 18 days.

item.title: November 25, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to use MVar and IORef to build concurrent and thread safe programmes in Haskell

Thought I Thought

Cleaning and drying clothes takes quite some time, but is really relaxing as well.

Today’s Media

Mostly listening to lofi music.

Song Of The Day

Eterna City, Mikel. A lofi remix of a pokemon song.

Today’s Question

What steps do I need to perform to enroll for a master’s degree?

item.title: November 24, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

Some more things about working in the terminal of my computer.

Thought I Thought

I should get back to locking in, haha.

Today’s Media

Watched some YuYu Hakusho again.

Song Of The Day

Color your night, big surprise.

Today’s Question

What shall I do in the evenings after work. Play or creative work?

Note To Self

Get back to learning Chinese you fool.

A Fascinating World

A world with your personal weather sphere around you would be cool. Getting climate control in a small sphere around you. I think the weather people would choose for themselves can reveal a lot about themselves. Hugging would become like a weather battle with clashing elements or some cool shit. Lightening, go!

item.title: November 23, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to play brass birmingham

Thought I Thought

I need more sleep.

Today’s Media

Playing some silksong

Song Of The Day

Flyday China town

Today’s Question

How to plan my next week for university.

Note To Self

Make sure to make some appointments for next weeks.

A Fascinating World

A lego TTRPG would go pretty hard I think. Like, lego dice, building things with friends to help solve puzzles or other obstacles thrown by the DM, stuff like that. IDK.

item.title: November 22, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

To enjoy time with my friends, and not beat myself up for not being perfect in providing for them.

Thought I Thought

I am really glad to have met all of these close friends

Today’s Media

The David/Collin/Levi Podcast xD

Song Of The Day

Red sun in the sky xD

Today’s Question

What to do to surpass this year’s birthday dinner. Hmmmmm

Note To Self

Learn from a Chinese guy how to make 糖油果子

item.title: November 21, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to fold dumplings

Thought I Thought

DotNL is actually kind of based

Today’s Media

I watched another YuYu Hakusho with Hans

Song Of The Day

IRIS OUT, from the Chainsawman movie

Today’s Question

How am I going to create enough food tomorrow.

Note To Self

Don’t forget to ask coworkers about their day sometimes

A Fascinating World

Teleporting from place to place would be really cool. I wonder what the infrastructure would be like. Would we have traffick jams at the teleportation circles/stations?

item.title: November 20, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to plan for a large dinner

Thought I Thought

At what times can I best study Mandarin

Today’s Media

I watched YuYu Hakusho with my brother

Song Of The Day

Color your night, Persona 3 reload.

Today’s Question

How can I balance pleasing friends and pleasing myself.

Note To Self

Make a shopping list before going to the toko.

A Fascinating World

Food gives you actual buffs like in video games, businesses have designated cooks to get just the right buffs to increase sales and development time. Shrimps would give you +4 gaming for obvious reasons.

item.title: November 19, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

The final parts of Chinese grammar for HSK 3

Thought I Thought

A clean environment really does cure dips

Today’s Media

I watched an interesting video about making games in Godot.

Song Of The Day

Random bossa nova songs.

Today’s Question

How do I manage my expectations for myself when holding social events or lessons? How can I ensure I don’t overprepare?

Note To Self

Keep practicing Chinese vocabulary ;)

item.title: November 18, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

Today I taught myself to get back on track with my bloggin intentions. After an amazing 2.5 months in China, it is high time I get back into my regular, awesome, radical flow

Thought I Thought

When making a game, I really like difficulty…

Today’s Media

I listened to a whole lot of music today, let’s see if my spotify wrapped will have increased my listing time this year :))

item.title: September 28, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to use different metrics about an object to “brute force” your way into object identification. As long as you have enough metrics, there is nothing you can’t qualify really.

Thought I Thought

Clover Coffee

Today’s Media

Nothing much, just figuring out Dianping again.

Song Of The Day

中间人， by Ice Paper.

Today’s Question

What shall I do during Golden Week next week.

Note To Self

Don’t slip, wear better shoes during the rain or walk slowly.

item.title: September 27, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to make mooncake

Thought I Thought

Japanese would also be quite an interesting language to learn after I’m finished with studying Chinese

Today’s Media

I felt a bit sick, so I did a lot of searching on Dianping for fun things to do while in China.

Song Of The Day

Today’s song is 时间胶囊 by Ryan.B and 丛琳潼elf

Today’s Question

How do people in China guess the pronunciation of a word they don’t know?

item.title: September 4, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to better work with generics and type-casting in c# in order to make a general system for working with Components in an ECS.

Thought I Thought

Timo To Go Seriouso

Today’s Media

Watched some more “The good place”, and tried a few episodes of Great Teacher Onizuka.

Song Of The Day

Ginger, by TOMOO. I resonate strongly with the cat in that song.

Today’s Question

Is fortune not man-made?

item.title: September 3, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

That the Chinese Visa system can be quite the pain in the ***

Thought I Thought

How lucky I am to have you and I live in the same world.

Today’s Media

I watched a few episodes of the good place, and finished the book “Press reset”.

Song Of The Day

My favorite song: Color you night, from Persona 3 reload. Today again, it helped me be filled with love.

item.title: September 2, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

How to use generic structs in C# to create interfaces that don’t need an instance of a class to still store information about that class.

Thought I Thought

Would a monkey think my phone is a fruit? (hopefully not)

Today’s Media

I started watching “The good place” on Netflix after having it recommended, and read two chapters of “Press reset” (2 more to go).

Song Of The Day

Again, it is Lucky, by TOMOO

item.title: September 1, 2025
item.description:
Today I Learned

I played with randomisation in Javascript to make this template, and learned how to convert my usual lay-out to new HTML elements.

Thought I Thought

Umbrellas are really cool weapons if you hold them like a baseball bat

Today’s Media

Watched “City the animation” by KyoAni, which I still find incredibly wholesome. Read a chapter of “Press reset” by Jason Schreier, which is more of a gut-punch in terms of what the Game industry is like.
